ISSUE.TITLE: Set LastSuccessUtc in Task constructor
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Set LastSuccessUtc property to the database value in the constructor as well. Without it, if the task throws an exception, the LastSuccessUtc column in the database will be overwritten with NULL since the property is never initialized.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1764 from rossiter10/rossiter10-LastSuccessUtc #1765 Schedule tasks. Set LastSuccessUtc property to the database value in the constructor as well. Without it, if the task throws an exception on application startup, the LastSuccessUtc column in the database will be overwritten with NULL since the property is never initialized.
